column1: Does anyone know what’s going on in fishermans village, men walking round in full blue body suits and area taped off
With COVID-19 around, maybe they’re just out shopping for essentials.
" With COVID-19 around "..... shhProbably just an early Halloween party, or maybe just civil servants, cleaning up the Unicorn sh*t .Edited: 5:15 am, April 05, 2020
I thought everything was normal on Ko Samui?Everything open and no virus.
A body was found in Fishermans Village, but there is not much information on social media.
Another non-event. Had nothing to do with COVID-19.
will the dead person's family consider it a non-eventEdited: 10:35 pm, April 07, 2020
